name: vermifuge
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a medicine that is used to destroy worms that live as parasites in the bodies of other living creatures and feed from them: Nicotine is commercially obtained from tobacco scraps and is used as an insecticide and as a veterinary vermifuge.
More examplesFewer examplesThe powdered leaves have also been employed as a vermifuge.He was interested in the medical applications of beets and carrots as vermifuges. The Chiltepin has been traditionally used in Mexico as a food, medicine, and vermifuge.McGuffie & Co. of Liverpool produced vermifuges and Stomach and Liver Capsules.
